attributes.title: Wow this was scary🤭
attributes.review:
First off I when I downloaded this app I was really looking forward to reading more about our wonderful president’s ideas and policies, but when I opened it I saw something that was so terrifying I don’t think I will be able to recover. When I opened the app I saw this terrible terrible-looking blob on it I was truly terrified. It was very orange and the top of the creature was a a floof of fur/ hair (I presume) that looked like it seriously got lost. Due to my sanity I immediately closed the app but if this was the torture I needed to take for the president I would do it. So I took on this crazy adventure again and tried to look past the blob of a creature and continue, although it was painful, it was to make America great again of course. Next there was something truly horrible that made me come here, you are not ready for the same blob creature showed up AGAIN! I thought I was over this process but no I couldn’t handle it it was so so horrific I couldn’t stand it the creature looked so scary, it attracted all the fleas and took the app physically of the phone, it kind sound crazy but it’s true. This is why, for the safety of America, this app should b avoided at all costs. 

Screw you Trump ✊🏿✊🏾✊🏽✊🏼✊🏻🌈

attributes.title: Absolutely not ( bad for your fruit )
attributes.review: The app is bad for your health and will make your phone blow up it takes up too much storage my phone crashed before I could even open the app. My pineapple lost the top of its self and my apple lost the stem my strawberries got moldy within seconds and my bananas never got ripe my blueberries turned green. This was very unacceptable and therefore if you care for your fruit don’t get the app

attributes.title: very misleading😡
